entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
